label: First semester
description: The first semester of the academic year, in a two term system. This semester will often, but not always, start in August, September, or October in the Northern Hemisphere, and in February or March in the Southern Hemiphere.

label: Second semester
description: The second semester of the academic year, in a two term system. This semester will often, but not always, start in January or February in the Northern Hemisphere, and in July, August, September, or October in the Southern Hemiphere.
